goals.description: Create advanced concurrency and parallelism framework
goals.success_criteria: Comprehensive concurrency system with multi-threading, async I/O, and parallel processing supporting high-performance computations

goals.description: Implement distributed computing and task distribution
goals.success_criteria: Distributed computing framework with task distribution, load balancing, and fault-tolerant execution across multiple nodes

goals.description: Build actor model and message-passing concurrency system
goals.success_criteria: Actor-based concurrency model with message passing, state management, and supervision hierarchies
